resources.string: "Think of classes as a recipe for a cake!"
"Think of attributes as someone's feature! Some people have black hair, some red..!"
"Methods are the actions the object can perform!"
"Abstraction is representing something complex more simple!
"Polymorphism allows for different variations of the same cake, depending on who bakes it!"
"Eg. A child will inherit some features and traits from his/her parents.. same thing!"
"Example of encapsulation is our car. We turn the keys and expect it to run, without knowing how the enginge works."
